job_tasks.justification: The term 'Full Stack Developer' inherently implies responsibilities for building and integrating various layers of a software application, which aligns with the definition of traditional software engineering tasks.

profile.rationale: The job title 'Full Stack Developer - AI Fact Checker' indicates a primary focus on software development ('Full Stack Developer') that integrates AI capabilities ('AI Fact Checker'). This aligns with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, where the role involves building and maintaining software that uses AI features, rather than specializing in AI model development itself.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is extremely brief, consisting only of the title. It lacks any details about specific responsibilities, technologies, or required skills beyond what can be inferred from the title. This makes a thorough and accurate analysis impossible, leading to a very low confidence score.
